Warning ⚠️

AI Website Builder Hall of Shame

These tools wasted my time, wasted my money, or straight-up lied about their AI capabilities.

Updated: January 2025 | Based on 400+ hours of real testing

Why I Published This

Most "AI website builder" reviews are affiliate spam. Reviewers get paid if you buy, so they never mention the problems.

I don't earn from these tools. I tested them all myself, spent my own money, and documented what actually happened.

This page exists so you don't waste your time on tools that don't deliver.

Mixo.io

AVOID

The Promise:

"Generate your entire website in 30 seconds with AI"

What Actually Happened:

  • Generated generic Lorem Ipsum content (not actual website copy)
  • AI "customization" just changed colors, not layout
  • "Free tier" barely functional - constantly upsold to $39/month
  • Export your site? That's $149 extra (hidden until after you build)
  • Tried 3 times, got 3 nearly identical "unique" sites

The Verdict:

Mixo is a landing page generator with aggressive upsells. It's not AI, it's templates with marketing fluff. Save your money.

Durable.co

BEWARE

The Promise:

"AI builds your website in 30 seconds. No coding needed."

What Actually Happened:

  • 30-second build? Yes. 3-hour edit to make it usable? Also yes.
  • AI wrote generic business fluff ("We are committed to excellence...")
  • "Unlimited pages" on $15/month plan = actually 10 pages
  • Custom domain? That's $12/month EXTRA on top of subscription
  • Support ignored 3 emails about billing discrepancies

The Verdict:

Durable builds fast, but everything meaningful costs extra. The $15/month plan is a teaser - real usage costs $39-79/month.

10Web AI

CAUTION

The Promise:

"Recreate any website with AI in minutes"

What Actually Happened:

  • Tried to recreate a competitor's site - got copyright warning immediately
  • AI recreation broke on mobile (text overflow, broken layouts)
  • "AI assistant" is just WordPress with a wrapper
  • Hosting costs double after first month ($10 → $20)
  • PageSpeed scores: 28-45 (advertised as 90+)

The Verdict:

10Web is fine for WordPress hosting. The "AI recreation" is misleading - it copies layout, not quality. If you want fast WordPress, use it. If you want AI magic, look elsewhere.

TeleportHQ

AVOID

The Promise:

"AI-powered wireframing to production"

What Actually Happened:

  • Upload wireframe → AI interprets it wrong 4 out of 5 times
  • "Export to React" = broken code that doesn't compile
  • Free tier watermarks everything (fine) but also breaks exports (not fine)
  • Tier structure intentionally confusing (Starter vs Pro vs Agency vs Enterprise)
  • Forum complaints unanswered for 6+ months

The Verdict:

Cool idea, poor execution. The AI isn't smart enough to be useful, and the export code is broken. Use Figma + hand-code instead.

Dishonorable Mentions

B12.io

Promised "AI copywriting" = got generic templates. $49/month for what Wix does free.

Zyro

"AI writer" is 50 synonyms. "AI heatmap" is a static overlay. Not AI, not smart.

CodeDesign.ai

Beautiful marketing, broken product. Exported code crashes browsers. Refund? Non-existent.

What Actually Works (2025)

After 400+ hours testing, these tools deliver real value:

Framer

Fastest AI generation. Real SEO. $15-25/month.

Webflow

Powerful CMS. Full control. $23-212/month.

v0.dev

Free tier works. Real code export. For developers.

See full comparison →

How I Test

  • • I pay for all tools myself (no freebie access from vendors)
  • • I build real sites, not demo pages
  • • I measure what matters: speed, quality, mobile performance, SEO
  • • I document everything (screenshots, timestamps, receipts)
  • • I have no affiliate relationships (can't be bought)

Got a correction? Email hello@aiwebsitebuilders.com with receipts/screenshots. I'll verify and update.
